intro.name: I am Ali Fahmi
intro.summary: I specialize in creating dynamic, user-focused applications using the MERN stack, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. My expertise includes implementing advanced features such as authentication, real-time communication with Socket.io, and smooth animations using Framer Motion. With a strong foundation in backend development, including MongoDB and Node.js, I take pride in building efficient and scalable solutions. My passion for learning and problem-solving drives me to deliver high-quality code and innovative projects.

aboutMe: I am a computer science and engineering student at BMSIT with a strong passion for application development and graphic design. Alongside my academic studies, I have gained hands-on experience through projects that utilize modern technologies such as React, Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, and Tailwind CSS. As a problem-solver, I continuously work on developing my skills to excel in the tech field and contribute innovative ideas to my projects.

uxUiDesign.title: UX & UI Design
uxUiDesign.description: I focus on creating intuitive and visually appealing designs that enhance the user experience. I am passionate about understanding user needs and behaviors to create seamless, user-centric interfaces. My skills include wireframing, prototyping, and conducting user research to ensure that the final product not only looks great but also serves its purpose effectively.

webDevelopment.title: Web Development
webDevelopment.description: I specialize in building dynamic and responsive websites that deliver seamless user experiences across various devices and platforms. With proficiency in front-end technologies such as React, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, I create interactive and engaging interfaces that meet both functional and aesthetic goals. On the backend, I work with Node.js, Express, and MongoDB to build scalable and efficient applications.

mobileDevelopment.title: Mobile Development
mobileDevelopment.description: I build cross-platform mobile applications using React Native. With a strong understanding of mobile development principles, I create responsive, intuitive, and high-performance apps that work seamlessly on both iOS and Android platforms. My skills include integrating native modules, optimizing app performance, and ensuring smooth navigation with UI components that provide a native-like experience.

latest.title: Front-End Developer
latest.description: I build dynamic and responsive websites that deliver seamless user experiences across various devices and platforms. With proficiency in front-end technologies such as React, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, I create interactive, engaging interfaces that meet both functional and aesthetic goals. Additionally, I work with backend tools like Node.js, Express, and MongoDB to build scalable and efficient applications.

graphicDesign.title: Graphic Design
graphicDesign.description: I began my journey as a graphic designer, diving into the world of creativity and visual storytelling. Driven by a passion for design, I explored tools like Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, and Canva, honing my skills in creating compelling visual content. I worked on projects ranging from logo design and branding to social media graphics, gradually developing a strong eye for aesthetics and detail.

frontEnd.title: Front-End Developer
frontEnd.description: I transitioned into front-end development, expanding my abilities from graphic design to crafting interactive and responsive user interfaces. Starting with foundational technologies like HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, I quickly mastered frameworks such as React.js, which became my go-to tool for building dynamic and efficient web applications.

backEnd.title: Back-End Developer
backEnd.description: I delved into backend development, broadening my expertise and gaining a deeper understanding of building robust, scalable web applications. I mastered Node.js and Express.js, establishing a solid foundation for creating efficient server-side logic and APIs. I worked extensively with databases like MongoDB, learning to design and manage schemas, implement CRUD operations, and optimize data handling for real-world applications.

fullStack.title: Full-Stack Developer
fullStack.description: I evolved into a full-stack developer, seamlessly integrating my frontend and backend expertise to build complete end-to-end web applications. Leveraging the MERN stack, I developed robust, dynamic, and scalable solutions while handling both client-side and server-side responsibilities efficiently. Many of my projects involved implementing complex features such as authentication systems.
